title: [Large-Scale] Creative Learning Design Workshop Integrating Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and digital tool implementation experience
context.additional_context: Workshop-style sessions enabling university students to creatively design literacy-based learning frameworks.

learning_goals: Participants can propose three or more literacy education design plans utilizing technologies such as digital games and e-book readers
Participants can complete creative learning design documents incorporating collaboration-based learning activities
Participants can evaluate design strategies that differentiate learning activities according to the characteristics of technological tools

resources: Digital learning tool samples (games, e-book readers, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
